(Berserk was sent from Cybertron to Earth because he was too 
dangerous to the public, so he arrived in a pod. He has no beast mode 
since his armor is tolerable to energon. He saw the Preds retreat 
from the Allience battle so he followed them. He stalked by the 
council base, and when Killfest and his group went inside, he caught 
the door before it closed. Berserk is a pro at sneaking around and 
killing his victims within seconds. He was made to do that. Does that 
answer your question?)


Beserk:



Beserk growled from the hit from his back. He lifted upright, baring 
his teeth. He watched Apocolypse walk away. No one attacked him and 
got away with it alive. He withdrew his clash sword, ready to attack 
him.
